txt.en: Baleleaf howls and calls for the return of his corrupted birch-hounds.
'Frothmar sleeps within its poisonous torrent no longer.'
'The keeper of the Darkthorn awakens!'
The south-west platform has collapsed under the Nemúl's assault!
Gortheron says 'I am impressed. You have overcome disease.'
'Ivar, I have failed you.'
'Gortheron! Send aid!'
'Rise and fight with us!'
Frothmar roars, 'Nemúl, destroy the south-west platform!'
'To arms! We must not fail the Dark Lord!'
Relay - Open Doors Override
'I am Gandalf the White!'
'Meaningless wretches! The ritual is complete, and you are too late.'
'My master has given me a new body, a strong body.'
Ivar's powers have increased!
'None still in this world can face me and live.'
'I will carve a path of destruction across this land.'
'And I will start with you!'
'Narslaug, you have failed me! I reclaim your power!'
'Matumáth, you have failed me! I reclaim your power!'
'Lands of Forochel, send forth my minions!'
To Enedwaith
<rgb=#FF0000>Dourbark is now vulnerable.</rgb>
The north-east platform has collapsed under the Nemúl's assault!
The south-east platform has collapsed under the Nemúl's assault!
'I toy with you no longer! This final gate will release the nightmares of the Black Land.'
'Your victories here today will be nothing more than a footnote in the history of my reign.'
'Just like Gandalf before you, it is now your time to fall!'
The south-east platform has collapsed under your weight!
'Lands of the Shire, send forth my minions!'
Gortheron's voice echoes, 'Your precious Grey Wizard climbed these same stairs.'
'He battled with an unspeakable ancient evil, and once they reached the very peak...'
'The Balrog threw him from this tower and left your wizard broken on the slopes of Zirakzigil.'
'Can you avoid his fate? Can you defeat that which smote your wizard?'
'Let the game begin.'
'Can you stand against Durin's Bane?'
Baleleaf is now vulnerable.
Baleleaf is now protected as the corrupted birch-hounds rise again.
Relay - Open Doors
The south-east platform shudders beneath the weight.
'Welcome to Ost Dunhoth, followers of the Grey Wizard.'
The north-west platform has collapsed under your weight!
'Let all of Eriador send forth those sworn to me!'
The north-east platform has collapsed under Frothmar's weight!
'That was Gandalf the Grey.'
'Sauron will avenge me!'
The north-west platform has collapsed under the Nemúl's assault!
The south-west platform has collapsed under Frothmar's weight!
'Lands of the Trollshaws, send forth my minions!'
'What is this interruption? The ritual is beginning, and Gortheron is weakened.'
'The helm I found in Stoneheight was not mine, but his.'
'His throne and powers shall be mine as well once you have been dealt with.'
'You are beginning to become a great thorn in my side. One I cannot tolerate for much longer.'
'Champions, destroy them!'
Ost Dunhoth
Relay - Disable Mammoth Door Reset Trigger
'Dúngorth, you have failed me! I reclaim your power!'
Frothmar roars, 'Nemúl, destroy the north-west platform!'
'Ivar, I have failed you.'
<rgb=#FF0000>Red mushrooms begin to spring up around Dourbark.</rgb>
The north-west platform has collapsed!
The south-east platform has collapsed!
Gortheron says 'Can you survive the poisoned waters to come?'
'Matúrz-olog, you have failed me! I reclaim your power!'
'I am impressed. You have overcome disease.'
Gortheron wails, 'Frothmar was a loyal servant and will not be easy to replace.'
'What will save you from them? The Wizards? Speak not to me of Wizards.'
Frothmar roars, 'Nemúl, destroy the north-east platform!'
'Two have abandoned you for distant lands; they care not for your pains.'
'The third spends his days idly in the wilderness; he cares more for animals than free folk.'
'The fourth seeks power, and only my master can give him that which he desires.'
'And the last? Gandalf the Grey? His death is the death of your hopes.'
'The Five Wizards have abandoned you.'
'Once, the gardens of Ost Dunhoth were renowned for their beauty.'
'In their absence, the Dark Powers now triumph and usher in a new age of despair.'
'I call upon Sauron to send me a champion from the depths of Mordor.'
The south-west platform shudders beneath the weight.
The south-west platform has collapsed!
'Ivar! I beseech thee!'
'Under my banner, this fortress now serves the Dark Lord.'
'Return to battle, old friends!'
'He has granted to me powers now unmatched in all of Middle-earth.'
'The invaders must be driven out!'
Ost Dunhoth
'Only one could have stood against me, and he has fallen into shadow.'
'As your hopes dwindle, are you prepared to face your darkest fears?'
Gortheron's laughter echoes through the chamber.
The north-east platform has collapsed under your weight!
'No longer. Now they produce death, disease, and the Red Cloud.'
'Their roots intertwine. One shall not fall without the other.'
'Now I depart and let them feed!'
You must have completed the 'Discoverer of Ost Dunhoth' deed to play this instance.
'Ivar, I have failed you.'
Relay - RESET
The north-west platform shudders beneath the weight.
Gortheron's voice bellows, 'Face Durin's Bane and be destroyed!'
The north-west platform has collapsed under Frothmar's weight!
'Thank goodness you have come! I have been scouting the area.'
Frothmar roars, 'Nemúl, destroy the south-east platform!'
'The path forward is this way!'
Relay - Disable Mammoth Door Reset Trigger
'This place shall be your end!'
'Come forth and bring their death!'
'Rise and destroy them!'
The north-east platform shudders beneath the weight.
<rgb=#FF0000>Dourbark is now protected as the decaying birch-hounds rise again.</rgb>
'I serve the secret fire...I wield the flame of Anor.'
'Go back to the shadow!'
Relay - Mammoths at Hyperspeed
'You have failed my game. Do you dare try again?'
'You shall not pass!'
'Release your hounds from behind the Black Gate. Send forth an army to destroy these lands!'
'Gandalf...no, it cannot be...you fell! You are dead! You cannot be here!'
'You know the rule! You are not allowed to interfere! You cannot harm me!'
The platform has collapsed under your weight!
'Lands of the North Downs, send forth my minions!'
The south-west platform has collapsed under your weight!
'Ivar, I have failed you.'
<rgb=#FF0000>Dourbark howls and calls for the return of his decaying birch-hounds.</rgb>
'Can you survive the poisoned waters to come?'
White mushrooms begin to spring up around Baleleaf.
The north-east platform has collapsed!
'It is impressive you have made it this far, but in the end it will matter not.'
The south-east platform has collapsed under Frothmar's weight!
'From a well deep beneath the earth, foulness rises and corrupts this ancient spring.'
